channel.title: CVE Feed for SAP_SE -- SAP My Travel Requests
channel.description: The latest CVEs for SAP_SE -- SAP My Travel Requests

item.title: CVE-2024-32731|2024-08-02T02:20:35.313Z -- sap_se -- sap%20my%20travel%20requests
item.description: SAP My Travel Requests does not perform necessary authorization checks for an authenticated user, resulting in escalation of privileges. On successful exploitation, the attacker can upload a malicious attachment to a business trip request which will lead to a low impact on the confidentiality, integrity and availability of the application.Â
